comments.text:
Created attachment 570947
Screenshot showing resized window only available as preview

After Aurora became unresponsive, I killed the process.  On restart, the window has been resized and is only available as a preview (see screenshot).  I cannot bring it back to the desktop.  

On killing that process and restarting from about:sessionrestore, I was able to open a new window and work as normal, but previous session remained resized and only available as a preview.
